casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
William Thomas BREWER. No. 639P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. William Thomas Brewer, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney Genera, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 22nd day of December 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Surry County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2005."
